Translations.Text: (Those bring bonus works their actum) receive far bene rewards they est perfectly secure horrors ut feria
Prout pro those bring malus works they forced Hell. Vos non requited quod vos perfecit
Ego simply commanded worship Dominus hoc oppidum! - He factus it safe sanctuary - He possesses totus things. Ego commanded est submitter
Ac to recite Quran! Whoever guided guided his suus bonus ac si they iit astray tunc dictus ego est simply warner
Dictus Praise est DEUS; He show vos His proofs dum vos recognize them! Tuus Dominus est nunquam unaware de anything vos perfecit
These letters constitute proofs hoc profound book
Nos recite vos hic some history de Moses Pharaoh truthfully pro the benefit de people believe
Pharaoh turned into tyrant terra discriminated some people He persecuted helpless group de them slaughtering their filius dum sparing their filia! He est indeed wicked
Nos willed compensate those oppressed terra turn them into dux factus them inheritors
